title: My Account cannot be accessed.
body:
My main account on the server OCE (Oceanic), cannot be accessed it keeps saying that the password or username is wrong, however it allows me to login to this account which is my alternate account which I made a while back to play with my little brother so I didn't have to play a level 30 account with a level 1 account and make him get smashed by out-leveled players all the time.
My main accounts in-game name is Phe but for some reason I cannot log onto it, no matter which PC I use (I have tried 3, on 3 separate internet connections, all of which work with other league accounts, just not my main account). I try to reset my main accounts data but apparently it is no longer on my E-mail address that this account it connected to as I had both hooked up to this E-mail address. Can anyone help me access my main account?

I have 300 Mastery Points. Mastery level 7 Thresh. Own all but Taliyah and have a bunch of skins, I have dumped some serious money into my main account over the last 3-4 years of playing League, please help?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your account may have been compromised, the first thing I would recommend doing is [submitting a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) (If you haven't already) to begin the account recovery process, they will lock the account to prevent further unauthorised activity being carried out on it until you can successfully recover it.

However while you wait, lets try and figure out how this happened.

* Have you entered your login credentials into any suspect third party sites?
  * Remember, any and all league related promotions will be hosted on the following domains (Or a subdomain of these *.domain.com)
   * www.riotgames.com
   * www.leagueoflegends.com
   * www.lolesports.com
* Have you downloaded any suspicious software recently that may have been infected?
* Is your antivirus up to date?
  * What antivirus are you currently using?
  * Have you run a system scan recently?
